metadata.synopsis: One-liner for the Beastmaster after returning from the Iron Throne.Two possible branches - one plays if the waveservants never ambushed you and the other if they did.
metadata.how_to_trigger: Talk to the Beastmaster after coming back from the Iron Throne.

2.speaker: Redhammer the Deviser
2.text: Cap needs all the attention I can spare, for now. But one day, when the world's set back to rights, we ought to strike out together again. See what's out there.
2.context: NodeContext: wistfully thinking of the next adventure - 'Cap' is the submarine they are repairing

3.speaker: Redhammer the Deviser
3.text: You were good to stick your neck out for me. Those nutters would've tossed me into the harbour with irons on my feet.

0.speaker: Redhammer the Deviser
0.text: I never forget someone who's done me a good turn. Neither does Cap. Thanks, mate.

4.speaker: Redhammer the Deviser
4.text: Hoo! What a ride! I won't forget it any time soon - and Cap neither.
4.context: NodeContext: just had a great adventure and is full of the joy of life

1.speaker: Redhammer the Deviser
1.text: I might've underestimated you before. Won't do that again. Thanks for the adventure! Ha!
1.context: NodeContext: just had a great adventure and is full of the joy of life
